upgrades.name: Local Advertising
upgrades.description: A small marketing push in the surrounding area draws in more customers, increasing attendance by 10%.

upgrades.name: TV Advertising
upgrades.description: Advertise your shop on local TV, targeting a larger audience and increasing customer flow by 25%. However, the cost of production and airing is steep.

upgrades.name: Social Media Campaign
upgrades.description: Run a targeted ad campaign on social media platforms, gaining attention from younger, tech-savvy customers. Boosts customer flow by 20%.

upgrades.name: Sponsorship Deals
upgrades.description: Sponsor a local event or sports team, bringing your brand into the public eye and increasing reputation. Increases customer loyalty and foot traffic by 10%.

upgrades.name: Outdoor Billboards
upgrades.description: Place large billboards near busy areas to increase your shop's visibility and boost customer flow by 30%. Great for attracting a wide audience, though costly.

upgrades.name: Radio Advertising
upgrades.description: Advertise your shop through local radio stations, reaching a wide audience. Increases customer flow by 15%, but can be expensive depending on the time slot.

upgrades.name: Event Coverage
upgrades.description: Get your shop covered by local media outlets during events. The publicity boosts customer flow and reputation, bringing more people to your store.

events.name: Grand Opening Redux
events.description: A massive relaunch event, complete with decorations, discounts, and free samples. The buzz draws in huge crowds, but profit margins take a temporary hit.

events.name: Midnight Madness Sale
events.description: A late-night shopping event offering massive discounts! Attracts deal-hunters, but only for a short time.

events.name: Influencer Partnership
events.description: A famous influencer features your shop, skyrocketing your reputation and increasing foot traffic!

events.name: Seasonal Festival Booth
events.description: Set up a special shop booth during a local festival. High sales potential, but you must provide extra stock.

events.name: Limited Edition Drops
events.description: Sell exclusive, time-limited items at a premium! Generates hype and attracts VIP customers.

events.name: Mystery Grab Bags
events.description: Offer surprise grab bags with random items! Some customers get great deals, while others get common items.

events.name: Charity Event
events.description: Host a charity event, donating a portion of profits to a good cause. Customers appreciate your generosity, boosting reputation!

events.name: Flash Sale!
events.description: A sudden and aggressive sale drives a massive influx of buyers! Sales increase by 50%, but to entice customers, all prices are slashed by 30%.
